Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Necropolis Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Hillborough Way, running east and west, intersects Necropolis Avenue, running north and south, at this rather busy intersection. To the south, you can make out the Harvest Circle, connecting Necropolis Avenue with Oceancrest Avenue in the center of the town. There are numerous shops on the west side of the intersection, and a magic shop on the northeast corner. The Shrines of Life and Death are located to the southeast.
